title: 'Exodus' is a spiritual successor to 'Mass Effect' with a hard sci-fi edge. We spoke to the devs about time-dilation, human evolution, and honoring hard sci-fi (exclusive)
description: Sci-fi adventure Exodus is looking alright, alright, alright.
content: Sci-fi adventure Exodus is looking alright, alright, alright.
